channel.title: Pratts, Christopher I on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pratts, Christopher I on Chege's Blog

item.title: 1. The 3 Rules of Epidemics
item.description: The Law of the Few From 1995 to 1996, the # of children born in Baltimore with syphillis increased 500%. CDC blamed it on cocaine and reduction in clinics. In 100k+ Colorado Springs town, the gonorrhoea epidemic tipped because of the activities of 168 people living in 4 small neighbourhoods, frequenting the same 6 bars. GaÃ«tan Dugas, an Air-Canada flight attendant, is [mis?]regarded as “Patient Zero” for AIDS in the US.
